name: Zombusters: Raspberry Pi Edition
description:
A classic twin-stick shooter with a twist, you will have to face lots of Zombies and other creatures with everything you got. Beware!

Please help us by Rating this game!

WHO YOU GONNA CALL?

There is something strange in the neighborhood. There are a lot of Zombies in our city, the zombie invasion is here! We need to stop them!

It will let you sticked on your seat until the end. Its 2D graphics and isometric view make it a different specie in its genre. You will have to face a horde of Zombies that try to get you down with the help of various weapons/power ups and different moving styles.

Features
  • Cool Weapons and Power-Ups
  • Leaderboards
  • Original Indie Soundtrack (12 Tracks)
  • 10 Different Maps
  • 4 Playable Characters
  • Input: Keyboard&Mouse and Gamepad (Xbox360)
  • Awesome Pixel Art graphics 

If you want to know more about the game please check out our Github Project page.
